title: Who am I?
text: Leo, based at the Plateau de Saclay since September 2020, and won’t leave before October 2027 (at least).

title: What’s my name
text:
Doctorant INRAE
Sujet : Modélisation stochastique et déterministe de contrôle de populations d’insectes par lâchers de mâles stériles - Applications en agro-écologie et épidémiologie
Encadré par Camille Coron et Luis Almeida

title: Research
text:
Subject: Stochastic and deterministic modeling of insect population control by releasing sterile males - Applications in agro-ecology and epidemiology.
Started on October 2024.
Supervisors: Camille Coron and Luis Almeida.

title: Home

title: Who am I?
text:
Where am I from?

Engineering degree from ENSTA Paris with a research Master’s (M2 MSV - Mathematics for Life Sciences) from Université Paris Saclay.
Prépa TSI at Lazaristes.
Bac STI2D, c la débrouille.

title: Research
text:
Research Interests
My research focuses on the control of a given population using Sterile Insect Technique (SIT) or Incompatible Insect Technique (IIT) using stochastic models.
My work aims to understand the dynamics of these populations, with properties such as extinction, reemergence, and the impact of environmental covariables on the population dynamics.
I study stochastic tools such as branching processes, birth-death processes and their limiting behavior, such as deterministic systems and stochastic diffusion models. Specifically, I focus on the Aedes genus, using real data from the Tetiaroa atoll.
